title: The Little Boy With No Heart: A Fairy Tale
features: A fairy tale about a little boy who forgot how to use his heart until he found love.
description: Check outlay new updated website: PaskePaintingsandBooks.com

Jacqueline has a BFA in Illustration from CVA in St. Paul, MN. She has been drawing and writing stories since she was a child. She has written 5 of the 18 books she illustrated. Though she grew up in Sarasota, FL, she is from Wisconsin where she currently lives with her family.PaskePaintingsandBooks.comPaskePaintingsandBooks.blogspot.com
